name: Choose Your Hero!
description:
A short 2D Real Time Strategy game with a twist! Choose from 3 different heroes who all play differently! Over 100+ Lines of dialogue and SFX, try to hear them all!

Knight: Slow but Tanky, and with a powerful Cleave attack!

Rogue: Swift but Squishy, excels in 1 on 1 combat!

Mage: Attacks from afar with 'Smart' Magic Bolts that prioritise other Ranged Units!
